places_with_reviews.name: Shivghat Waterfall
places_with_reviews.address: QM5G+W56, SH 174, Nilsakiya, Ghoghli, Gujarat 394710, India

reviews.text:
Nice waterfall near saputara
No need to special go there becoz it is on way when you go to saputara u can easily see
In monsoon season ,this waterfall looks awesome. Must visit you would feel peaceful  hear. The Hanumanji temple is placed at the waterfall it looks so nice..

This place has its beauty during rainy season. It falls near by Ahva on Pimpri Ahva road. There is temple and this little fall passes from there. Since this place falls at road side, no parking place available here. You can park your vehicle around if no other vehicles are there. For photography this place is nice.
a perfect place to hault ur trip. 15 minutes a break here.

This Religion Place Situated at very Awesome place.
It is on the road which connect to Tahsil named as Waghai and Ahwa. Shiv Ghat is a Temple of Lord Shiva and Lord Hanuman Maharaj. Behind the temple is big Cliff and Opposite side of temple is deep gulf of forest. Way to this place is so much enjoying and entertainment things.
Beautiful waterfall on the road of Ahwa-saputara.
Lovely water fall and beautiful nature devoted about loard shiva
Beautiful place with small waterfall on the road of Ahwa-Songarh.
This is the best place place for nature lovers during monsoon season after rain 🌧️ fall
good place as visiting place. good nature look seen here with water falls. Way as too much thin single side so its difficulty to drive after else its good visiting place with family.

Quite difficult for group of people. This place is for solo travelers or for small group of people who loves calmness of nature. This is the real photos of Nilsakiya Waterfall other than this photos are misguiding to travelers. So be careful.
Hidden waterfall, best for couples.

Very nice waterfall..
You will visit there with parents and friends.
You should wear grip shoes for tracking.
Small water fall but has it's beauty in monsoon season.
Nice place but not big... It's a very small fall
Great place to explore in mid of jungle.
Very beautiful very natural place feeling so good
Beautiful place.
Good Fall
Very Nice water fall
Good place and camp site
Nice

Devinamal Eco Tourism is a nice place on the road from Waghai to Ahva and Saputara.
This place built in natural forest is isolated and well maintained with 5 good and 2 common cottages total 7 cottages are for public and additional 2 cottages are for forest department officers. Tea, breakfast and lunch are well prepared, there is an adventure park for young and old people, and there is also a forest department nursery. Booking of cottages is done online. There are also guides for trekking.
According to my estimation, August to January is the best time to go to Devinamal

places_with_reviews.name: Dandakeshwar Mahadev Temple Ahwa
places_with_reviews.address: QM5P+7G8, Deval Pada, Shubhash Colony, Ahwa, Gujarat 394710, India

reviews.text: This Temple is dedicated to Lord Shiva.There are many temple of Lord Shiva arround us and this is one of them.It is beautiful place and Cleaning is done on time.Also Garba is played here on the auspicious occasion of Navratri.{Garba is include one of the Intangible site in World Heritage}.Vistors can freely visit this place.Many festival celebrate here.As per My experience it is wonderful place and good atmosphere at this place.

This is very beautiful and peaceful place. This temple is very oldest temple in ahwa. Here is very big ground for all fastivals are celebrated like Navratri, ganesh chaturthi, mahashivratri,Hanuman jayanti, ramnavmi,etc. All Hindu religion fastivals. And many peoples are joined here this is very big temple.
Good temple in ahwa
Nice
Best Devotional place within whole town
